docs_row.name: Search_Hotel_Destination
docs_row.description: Find Hotels by their location, address, state, country, etc. This api's response contains the latitude and longitude for the search query. EndPoint: /api/v1/hotels/searchDestination

query.description: Names of locations, cities, districts, places, countries, counties etc.
